Description: --> Fender Player Stratocaster Electric Guitar (Black, Maple Fingerboard) Used This item is slightly used and has been thoroughly checked out by our experts to make sure it is in perfect working condition. We then re-sealed it in its original packaging with all factory included accessories. This item is guaranteed to be in "as new" condition and has virtually no cosmetic imperfections. This item is covered with a one year warranty from Sam Ash. The Player Stratocaster from Fender gives you all that timeless sound, style, and flexibility at a price that working musicians will surely appreciate. With the perfect blend of classic and contemporary, the Player Strat comes equipped with versatile Strat electronics along with high-quality hardware. This Strat is perfect for students, beginners, and seasoned alike that seek a fantastically flexible instrument at an affordable price.Classic and ContemporaryOld-school appointments such as more traditional body radii are melded with more new-age features such as a modern "C" neck, a contemporary 9.5" fingerboard radius, 5-way switching, and more. This creates an instrument that truly gives you the best of both tradition and innovation.Versatile Strat ElectronicsThe Stratocaster has always been known for its ability to cover a wide range of genres thanks to its 3 single-coil pickup design. Producing those sweet singing single-coil Strat tones that weve all come to know and love over the years, the electronics on this Player Stratocaster incorporate three Player Series Alnico 5 Strat pickups along with modern 5-way switching for a vast selection of tonal possibilities.High-Quality HardwareEquipped with high-quality hardware, the Player Stratocaster delivers the amazing performance that its always been known for since its introduction. With a 2-point synchronized tremolo and a set of standard cast/sealed tuners, you can be sure that this Strat will stay in tune even after intense vibratos.Features:Gloss-Finished Alder BodyModern "C" Maple Neck with 22-Fret, 9.5"-Radius Fingerboard3 Player Series Single-Coil Pickups with 5-Way SwitchingStandard Cast/Sealed Tuners and 2-Point Synchronized TremoloCase Not IncludedGet your Fender Player Stratocaster Electric Guitar today at the guaranteed lowest price from Sam Ash with our 45-day return and 60-day price protection policy.
